thread.title: USA Today: Triangle hotel among 10 'Best Romantic Inns'
thread.title_full: USA Today: Triangle hotel among 10 'Best Romantic Inns'

author: Rebecca Troyer
title: USA Today: Triangle hotel among 10 'Best Romantic Inns'
text:
Enlarge gitusik Fearrington House Inn in Pittsboro has landed on USA Today Travel 's list of the 10 "Best Romantic Inns" in the U.S. "The Fearrington House Inn blends the luxury and service associated with Relais & Chateaux property with the legendary charm of the South," writes USA Today . Fearrington ranks No. 7 on the list, based on reader votes among a list of 20 nominees selected by USA Today .
